description: This half of a human corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.
This half of a human corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.

special_attacks.monster_message: The pupating zombie crawler bursts, and gore-smeared winged beasts climb out of the corpse!
